G

gameOver - Static variable in class Maze.GamePanel
Boolean which is triggered (true) when levelTime becomes zero (0).
gameOver() - Method in class Maze.GamePanel
Handles the end game animation where cells generated by the maze are wiped off the screen with a 100ms period between each wipe.
GamePanel - Class in Maze
JPanel extension which handles the main game loop, updates and drawing to the screen.
GamePanel(int) - Constructor for class Maze.GamePanel
Initializes the GamePanel object by adjusting panel dimensions, generating a new maze, initializing input handling and character position.
gameUpdate() - Method in class Maze.GamePanel
Updating portion of the game loop, the method updates the character's position on the screen while gameOver is false (not over) and while finalScreen is true (End game menu).
generateMaze(int, int) - Method in class Maze.GenMaze
Generates a maze by starting at the unvisited cell located at row x and column y.
generateNum(int) - Static method in class Maze.GenMaze
Returns a random integer number based on the maze size argument.
GenMaze - Class in Maze
Recursively generates a maze by "destroying" or hiding walls in each Cell object in a two dimensional array.
GenMaze(int, int, int) - Constructor for class Maze.GenMaze
Initializes a grid (2D Array) of size dim+2 and calls methods to initialize each cell object in the array, a pair of random numbers are generated to produce a random timePoint cell and the startPoint cell is initialized as well (startPoint at 1,1).
getBounds() - Method in class Maze.Character
Returns a new rectangle object at the player's current position.
getCellBox() - Method in class Maze.RectCell
Returns the rectangle object (graphical) that represents this.
getCellNumber() - Method in class Maze.Cell
Returns the cell number determined by GenMaze.
getCoordX() - Method in class Maze.Cell
Returns the physical x coordinate on the completed maze.
getCoordY() - Method in class Maze.Cell
Returns the physical y coordinate on the completed maze.
getDif() - Static method in class Maze.StartMenu
Returns the difficulty setting chosen by the user at the beginning of the game.
getEastWall() - Method in class Maze.RectCell
Returns the eastern wall rectangle object (graphical) for this.
getGrid(int, int) - Method in class Maze.GenMaze
Returns the cell object located at row x and column y.
getGridDimensions() - Method in class Maze.GenMaze
Returns only the visible portion of the grid size (N), which is essentially the maze dimensions.
getHeight() - Method in class Maze.Character
Returns the height of the player.
getNorthWall() - Method in class Maze.RectCell
Returns the northern wall rectangle object (graphical) for this.
getPositionX() - Method in class Maze.Cell
Returns the row number determined by GenMaze.
getPositionY() - Method in class Maze.Cell
Returns the column number determined by GenMaze.
getRectangles() - Method in class Maze.GraphicsMaze
Returns a clone (for safety) of the RectCell array list which is required by the character object's collision detection.
getSouthWall() - Method in class Maze.RectCell
Returns the southern wall rectangle object (graphical) for this.
getWestWall() - Method in class Maze.RectCell
Returns the western wall rectangle object (graphical) for this.
getWidth() - Method in class Maze.Character
Returns the width of the player.
getxPos() - Method in class Maze.Character
Returns the current x coordinate of the player.
getyPos() - Method in class Maze.Character
Returns the current x coordinate of the player.
gMaze - Variable in class Maze.GamePanel
Contains a GraphicsMaze object which is generated upon initialization of GamePanel or when a new level is initialized.
goLine - Variable in class Maze.GraphicsMaze
Buffered image container for the start point cell (Starting position) image.
gp - Variable in class Maze.StartGame
The main game panel object which handles the game loop, this panel extends the JPanel class.
GraphicsMaze - Class in Maze
Generates a graphical representation of the GenMaze object.
GraphicsMaze(GenMaze) - Constructor for class Maze.GraphicsMaze
Initializes the specific images required for cell tiles and walls as well as initializing an thread safe array list of RectCell objects.
grid - Variable in class Maze.GenMaze
A two dimensional array that represents a grid, where each block in the grid is a cell.
gridDimensions - Variable in class Maze.GenMaze
The two dimensional array's grid dimensions (N by N).
